name: Clickdraw Clicker (itch)
description:
Clickdraw is an addictive completely RNG western clicker game

To play the game you select a location that you think the enemy will move to and a location that you want to move too, when you draw your weapon if you select the location that the enemy selected to move too then you will hit them and vice versa.

Each enemy has a different skill that you will have to overcome

It also has local multiplayer, just don't let your friend see where you clicked!

It's simple but addictive
